movie.title: From Fat Lolli to Six Pack Lolli: The Ultimate Transformation Story
movie.title_english: From Fat Lolli to Six Pack Lolli: The Ultimate Transformation Story
movie.title_long: From Fat Lolli to Six Pack Lolli: The Ultimate Transformation Story (2020)
movie.description_intro: Having been obese his entire life, real estate mogul and multimillionaire, Anthony Lolli has accepted his greatest challenge to date. Follow this inspiring journey as he sheds 125lbs in only 9 months leading to a fitness competition where he shows the world that nothing is unachievable. Through blood, sweat, and tears, From Fat Lolli to 6 Pack Lolli is truly the Ultimate Transformation Story.
movie.description_full: Having been obese his entire life, real estate mogul and multimillionaire, Anthony Lolli has accepted his greatest challenge to date. Follow this inspiring journey as he sheds 125lbs in only 9 months leading to a fitness competition where he shows the world that nothing is unachievable. Through blood, sweat, and tears, From Fat Lolli to 6 Pack Lolli is truly the Ultimate Transformation Story.

movies.title: Reversing Roe
movies.summary: A deep historical look at one of the most controversial issues of our time, highlighting the abortion debate from various points along the ideological spectrum in a winding story of abortion in America.
movies.description_full: A deep historical look at one of the most controversial issues of our time, highlighting the abortion debate from various points along the ideological spectrum in a winding story of abortion in America.
movies.synopsis: A deep historical look at one of the most controversial issues of our time, highlighting the abortion debate from various points along the ideological spectrum in a winding story of abortion in America.

movies.title: Stockton on My Mind
movies.summary: Mayor Tubbs through his first term in office as he tirelessly advances his innovative proposals for a city at a turning point.
movies.description_full: Mayor Tubbs through his first term in office as he tirelessly advances his innovative proposals for a city at a turning point.

movies.title: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston
movies.title_english: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston
movies.title_long: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston (2019)
movies.summary: Overcoming the seemingly insurmountable odds that life threw his way, Liston became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Just eight years later, his wife finds him dead in their Las Vegas home from a supposed heroin overdose. Suspicion as to the cause of death pervaded among those that knew him.
movies.description_full: Overcoming the seemingly insurmountable odds that life threw his way, Liston became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Just eight years later, his wife finds him dead in their Las Vegas home from a supposed heroin overdose. Suspicion as to the cause of death pervaded among those that knew him.

movies.title: How to Catch a Serial Killer
movies.title_english: How to Catch a Serial Killer
movies.title_long: How to Catch a Serial Killer (2018)
movies.summary: Sir Trevor McDonald presents this documentary which explores the extraordinary pursuit of serial killer Christopher Halliwell by detective Steve Fulcher.
movies.description_full: Sir Trevor McDonald presents this documentary which explores the extraordinary pursuit of serial killer Christopher Halliwell by detective Steve Fulcher.
